lead_paragraph: Ray Grebey, who led Major League Baseball labor negotiations during the tumultuous 50-day strike that split the 1981 season, has died. He was 85.

headline.main: Ray Grebey, Led MLB During 1981 Strike, Dead at 85
headline.print_headline: Ray Grebey, Led MLB During 1981 Strike, Dead at 85
